name: Dairy Cow (Spotted)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="cowGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(240,240,240);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="80" fill="url(#cowGrad)" />
  <circle cx="350" cy="300" r="30" fill="#333333" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="300" r="40" fill="url(#cowGrad)" />
  <rect x="150" y="310" width="30" height="10" fill="#FF69B4" />
  <path d="M 200 260 L 150 230 L 250 230 Z" fill="url(#cowGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Pink Pig
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="pigGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,200,220);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,150,180);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="350" r="100" fill="url(#pigGrad)" />
  <circle cx="180" cy="320" r="40" fill="url(#pigGrad)" />
  <circle cx="180" cy="320" r="15" fill="#FF69B4" />
  <circle cx="170" cy="315" r="3" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="190" cy="315" r="3" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 200 280 L 180 250 L 220 250 Z" fill="url(#pigGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Yellow Duck
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="duckGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="350" r="80" fill="url(#duckGrad)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="300" r="40" fill="url(#duckGrad)" />
  <polygon points="180,310 150,320 180,330 Z" fill="#FF8C00" />
  <circle cx="185" cy="295" r="3" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: White Chicken
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="chickenGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(240,240,240);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="350" r="80" fill="url(#chickenGrad)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="300" r="40" fill="url(#chickenGrad)" />
  <polygon points="200,280 180,260 220,260 Z" fill="#FF0000" />
  <polygon points="180,300 160,320 200,320 Z" fill="#FF8C00" />
</svg>

name: Fluffy Sheep
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="sheepWoolGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="350" r="100" fill="url(#sheepWoolGrad)" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="330" r="30" fill="#8B4513" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="330" r="5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Brown Horse
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="horseGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,82,45);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,41,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="80" fill="url(#horseGrad)" />
  <path d="M 100 350 L 100 200 L 150 200 L 150 350 Z" fill="url(#horseGrad)" />
  <circle cx="125" cy="200" r="15" fill="url(#horseGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Penguin
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="penguinGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(10,10,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="200" y="200" width="112" height="200" fill="url(#penguinGrad)" rx="56" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="300" rx="30" ry="80" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="250" r="10" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Goldfish
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="goldfishGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,180,0);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,130,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 100 256 C 150 200, 400 200, 450 256 C 400 312, 150 312, 100 256 Z" fill="url(#goldfishGrad)" />
  <path d="M 450 256 L 480 236 L 480 276 Z" fill="url(#goldfishGrad)" />
  <circle cx="120" cy="256" r="5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Green Frog
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="frogGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,200,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,150,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="100" ry="50" fill="url(#frogGrad)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="300" r="20" fill="url(#frogGrad)" />
  <circle cx="312" cy="300" r="20" fill="url(#frogGrad)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="300" r="5" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  <circle cx="312" cy="300" r="5" fill="#FFFFFF" />
</svg>

name: Goat
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="goatGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(220,220,220);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(170,170,170);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="80" fill="url(#goatGrad)" />
  <path d="M 100 350 L 150 250 L 200 250 L 250 350 Z" fill="url(#goatGrad)" />
  <path d="M 120 250 L 120 150" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M 170 250 L 170 150" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>
